member.name: INTERACTION_ARGUMENTS_MANIPULATION
member.summary: Defines the state of a manipulation.

member.name: INTERACTION_ARGUMENTS_MANIPULATION.delta
member.summary: The change in translation, rotation, and scale since the last INTERACTION_CONTEXT_OUTPUT_CALLBACK.

member.name: INTERACTION_ARGUMENTS_MANIPULATION.cumulative
member.summary: The accumulated change in translation, rotation, and scale since the interaction started.

member.name: INTERACTION_ARGUMENTS_MANIPULATION.velocity
member.summary: The velocities of the accumulated transformations for the interaction.

member.name: INTERACTION_ARGUMENTS_MANIPULATION.railsState
member.summary: One of the constants from MANIPULATION_RAILS_STATE.
